<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">640f8ec11bec71500f0eda43cc4bcb27</macroponent><name>resizable_panes_container/defaultDisplayedPane</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {any} params.imports
  */
function evaluateProperty({api}) {
  const viewports = api.viewports;
  
  if (!viewports || !viewports.isRouteInitializationCompleted)
    return 'both';
  
  // hide the right side panel if there are no active routes.
  return viewports.contextual_sidebar.hasRoutes ? 'both' : 'left';
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>TBlev1</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-07 17:46:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>fc0f8ec11bec71500f0eda43cc4bcb89</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>resizable_panes_container/defaultDisplayedPane</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Insight Process Management" source="x_snc_insight_pr_0">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Insight Process Management">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fc0f8ec11bec71500f0eda43cc4bcb89</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>TBlev1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-07 17:46:40</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
